name: Team Morale - Among Us
description: One of the ways we stay in touch with each other within my Team throughout remote working. Incorporated into our regular meetings, every one drags their avatars into the center piece according to how they feel that day/week/Sprint, with 1 being the worst and 10 being the best. The facilitation after the drag-and-drop can be an open forum, or one-by-one sharing by each member. Feel free to adopt it to your needs!
